name: Ultimate Showdown (itch)
description:
==============================================================================
Ultimate Showdown
==============================================================================

You have been transported into a chamber by an evil wizard. You must fight for his entertainment as he continues to throw more and more things into the chamber.

Controls -

Left - Left Arrow
Right - Right Arrow
Up - Up Arrow
Down - Down Arrow
Attack - Z

Fix 1 - Enemies were staying their invuln color instead of turning back. I corrected this before but must have gotten rid of the piece that fixed it at some point. Released new builds.

Planned Updates:
V1.1
Add bow as a weapon
Add New Boss

V1.2
Add staff (magic) as a weapon
2 new enemy types

V1.3
Add dodge mechanic
Possibly attack combo

V1.4
Change score for gold
Use gold to upgrade yourself instead of relying on random drops
